channel.title: Challange To Good Coders
channel.description: All Good Coders Try Figure This One Out, In My New Minigame, An Item Acts As A ring Of Life, What I Want Is So When You DIE In This Certain Place, You DONT Lose Your Items, Or When You Die With This Certain Item Equipped You Dont Lose Your Items, But Do Get Teled Away, All Good Coders...Try This.

item.title: Challange To Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Change from a void to boolean.

[code]

public boolean applyDeadMinigame() {
if(IsDead == true && absX >= SW && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <=NE) {
sendMessage(“You Died In The Minigame…”);
teleportToX = X;
teleportToY = Y;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Challange To Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

Ha, Very Well Done Java, Id Rep You If I Could, But, When It Teles Them Out, It Doesnt Let Them Back In The Game

Read full topic

item.title: Challange To Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:6, topic:168089”]Edit the applyDead() boolean.
If(absX >= blah blah whatever else I had) {
teleportToX = #;
teleportToY = #;
} else {[/quote]

That would be bad, because that method is used for pking when you die.

Try This:

public void ApplyDeadMiniGame() { if(absX >= SW && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <=NE) { sendMessage("You Died In The Minigame..."); teleportToX = X; teleportToY = Y; } }

**My god firefox makes the text look like shit **

EDIT:

Make sure to make it check the person’s hp and other levels, so they are reverted back to their normal levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Challange To Good Coders
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Make a boolean that’ll make the person teleport away when they die.

boolean dies() {
teleportToX = ;
teleportToY = ;
return true;
}

if(playerHasItem(#) && correctCoords() == true) {
dies() = true;
}

boolean correctCoords() {
absX >= # && absX <= # && absY >= # && absY <= #;
return true;
}

You know, something like that.

Read full topic
